resources.string: Good Job. You got an Action Point!
The city is in danger because of the pollution and global warming. Solve the quiz and save the city.
Your concern for the environment has helped protect the environment and save the city.
Too many private cars are causing heavy pollution and traffic jams. The introduction of public transport is urgently needed.(need 3 action points)
The emission of greenhouse gases and soot from fossil fuel power plants is serious. There is an urgent need to replace it with a new and renewable energy power plant.(need 3 action points)
Forests have been damaged by excessive logging. There is an urgent need to restore the forest.(need 3 action points)

string-array.name: quiz
string-array.item: Which of the following is not correct with new renewable energy?
Which of the following is not correct with components of greenhouse gases?
The cause of climate change is global economic growth and population growth.
The overall global temperature has increased by about ㅡ℃ over the past 100 years.
Which of the following is correct with a major cause of the greenhouse effect?
Climate change is a phenomenon in which the average temperature of the Earth changes.
The nature herbivore animal population and groups are not affected by the increase in carbon dioxide.
Which of the following is not correct with natural causes of climate change?
Too much aerosol increases the temperature of the atmosphere.
Which of the following is a major cause of the increase in carbon dioxide?
Which of the following techniques is used to extract carbon dioxide before it is discharged into the atmosphere and store it in liquid form under pressure?
